statements: SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, date FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, clicks FROM engagement_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT date, clicks FROM engagement_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY clicks DESC, date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND impressions > 100 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING avg_clicks > 50
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE clicks >= 50 AND impressions <= 200 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id FROM engagement_metrics
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, impression_count FROM engagement_metrics WHERE click_count > 10;
SELECT campaign_name, click_count, impression_count FROM engagement_metrics WHERE impression_count < 1000;
SELECT id, campaign_id, conversion_count, revenue_generated FROM campaign_results WHERE revenue_generated > 5000.00;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE impression_count > 100 AND click_count > 50
SELECT campaign_name, impression_count, click_count FROM engagement_metrics WHERE impression_count < 200
SELECT campaign_name, impression_count, click_count FROM engagement_metrics ORDER BY impression_count DESC
SELECT campaign_name, click_count, impression_count FROM engagement_metrics WHERE click_count >= 20 ORDER BY click_count ASC
SELECT e.campaign_name, e.impression_count, c.conversion_count, c.revenue_generated FROM engagement_metrics e JOIN campaign_results c ON e.id = c.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM clicks;
SELECT click_id, user_id, location FROM clicks WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT impression_id, user_id, campaign_id FROM impressions WHERE user_id = 202 AND device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM clicks JOIN impressions ON clicks.user_id = impressions.user_id;
SELECT click_id, user_id, location FROM clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT impression_id, user_id, device_type FROM impressions WHERE campaign_id = 3 ORDER BY impression_timestamp ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT * FROM clicks JOIN impressions ON clicks.user_id = impressions.user_id WHERE clicks.location LIKE '%New York%' AND impressions.device_type IN ('Desktop', 'Mobile') ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM clicks LEFT JOIN impressions ON clicks.user_id = impressions.user_id LEFT JOIN campaigns ON campaigns.campaign_id = impressions.campaign_id WHERE clicks.user_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT campaign_id, click_count, impression_count FROM engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT click_timestamp, user_id FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE click_count > 100 AND impression_count > 500;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(click_count) AS total_clicks FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS click_frequency FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id HAVING click_frequency > 10;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, ad_impressions.impression_timestamp FROM campaigns INNER JOIN ad_impressions ON campaigns.campaign_id = ad_impressions.ad_id WHERE ad_impressions.user_id = 12345 ORDER BY ad_impressions.impression_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT platform_name, impressions FROM platform_metrics ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT audience_name, age_range, gender FROM audience_metrics WHERE age_range = '18-24' AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT location_name, city, country, clicks FROM location_metrics WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, audience_name, gender FROM audience_metrics WHERE age_range = '18-24' AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions DESC;
SELECT platform_name, clicks, impressions FROM platform_metrics WHERE clicks >= 500 AND impressions < 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT city, country, impressions FROM location_metrics WHERE city = 'New York' OR city = 'Los Angeles' AND country = 'USA' ORDER BY impressions DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, impressions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions DESC;
